title: Just Part Of the Job
creator_credit: Evan Keddie, Kim Windsor and Victorian Unemployed Workers' Union
brief_description: Designed to stimulate discussion regarding sexual harassment. Shows a school leaver and her efforts to find a job. Presents the difficult situation she finds herself in when she is subject to a rather subtle form of sexual harassment in an employment interview.
creator_credit_for_label: Evan Keddie, Kim Windsor and Victorian Unemployed Workers’ Union
